name: Pixelonetry Companion
author: pixelonetry

sections.description:
This plugin creates the additional sections on the home page for pixelonery themes. By installing the PIXELONETRY Companion plugin.
Pixelonetry Companion is a plugin created to enhance front Page Sections the functionality of the WordPress theme created by pixelonetry.

Features

Slider Section
Info Section
Service Section
Call To Action Section
Team Section
Pricing Section
About Section
Contact Section
And many more.

License

Pixelonetry Companion WordPress plugin, Copyright (C) 2024 pixelonetry Team
pixeloentry Companion WordPress plugin is licensed under the GPL3 (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html).

Donate

If you like the plugin, please consider making a donation to support future development.
Donate here
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Submit Plugin to WP.org

1.0.1

  • Fixed Prefix Issues
  • Fixed Plugin Header
  • Fixed Textdomains

1.0.2

  • Changed email associated with WordPress.org account for ownership verification.
  • Additional minor fixes and improvements (if applicable).
